result.eng: We deal with enquiries from the public.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobal

result.eng: This television station caters for the whole community.
result.ga: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uilig
result.orig: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uilig

result.ponchtml: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an ṗobal uiligThis television station caters for the whole community.

result.eng: That community was worst affected by emigration.
result.ga: Ba ar an phobal sin is mó a thit ualach na heisimirce

result.html: Ba ar an phobal sin is mó a thit ualach na heisimirceThat community was worst affected by emigration.

result.eng: They gave the Irish-language community something to read.
